trans-unit.source: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um fluxo que utiliza o protocolo de segurança Negociar para autenticar o cliente e, opcionalmente, o servidor, comunicação cliente-servidor.

trans-unit.source: Use the NegotiateStream class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de NegotiateStream para autenticação e para ajudar a proteger informações transmitidas entre um cliente e um servidor.

trans-unit.source: Using NegotiateStream, you can do the following.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar NegotiateStream, pode fazer o seguinte.

trans-unit.source: - Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation.
trans-unit.target: -Envie credenciais do cliente para o servidor para representação ou delegação.

trans-unit.source: - Request server authentication.
trans-unit.target: -Autenticação do pedido.

trans-unit.source: - Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it.
trans-unit.target: -Encriptar e/ou assinar dados antes de os transmitir.

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação tem de ser executada antes de os transmitir informações.

trans-unit.source: Clients request authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: Os clientes pedem autenticação utilizando o síncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>métodos, que bloquear até concluir a autenticação, ou o assíncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>métodos, que não bloqueiam ao aguardar que a autenticação concluir.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers request authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Servidores de pedem de autenticação utilizando o síncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>ou assíncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol.
trans-unit.target: O cliente e, opcionalmente, o servidor, é autenticado utilizando o protocolo de segurança negociar.

trans-unit.source: On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Em sistemas Windows 95/98, o Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) é o protocolo utilizado para autenticação.

trans-unit.source: On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used.
trans-unit.target: Em outras plataformas Kerberos protocolo é utilizado para autenticação, se o cliente e o servidor suportam; caso contrário, é utilizado o NTLM.

trans-unit.source: For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter descrições detalhadas destes protocolos, consulte a documentação do SDK de plataforma no MSDN, no msdn.microsoft.com/library/.

trans-unit.source: The NegotiateStream class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: A classe de NegotiateStream efetua a autenticação através da Interface de fornecedor de suporte de segurança (SSPI).

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services will be used by the NegotiateStream to help secure your data during transmission.
trans-unit.target: Quando autenticação for bem sucedida, tem de verificar o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Propriedades para determinar que serviços de segurança serão utilizadas pelo NegotiateStream para ajudar a proteger os dados durante a transmissão.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Verifique o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>propriedade para determinar se a autenticação mútua ocorreu.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get information about the remote client or server using the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter informações sobre o cliente remoto ou o servidor a utilizar o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you will receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Se falhar a autenticação, irá receber uma <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>ou <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode tentar novamente a autenticação com uma credencial diferente.

trans-unit.source: You send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Enviar dados utilizando o síncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>ou assíncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: You receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Recebe dados utilizando o síncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>ou assíncrona <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the NegotiateStream.
trans-unit.target: Se a segurança dos serviços, tais como encriptação ou a assinatura estão ativados, estes são automaticamente aplicadas aos seus dados pelo NegotiateStream.

trans-unit.source: The NegotiateStream transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the NegotiateStream.
trans-unit.target: O NegotiateStream transmite dados através de um fluxo que forneceu ao criar o NegotiateStream.

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the NegotiateStream also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Ao fornecer este fluxo subjacente, tem a opção para especificar se fechar o NegotiateStream também fecha o fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> classe utilizando o <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> especificado

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto utilizado pelo <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> para enviar e receber dados.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and stream closure behavior.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref:System.IO.Stream>e comportamento de fecho de sequência.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Quando especificar `true` para o `leaveStreamOpen` parâmetro, a fechar o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>não tem qualquer efeito `innerStream` transmitir; tem de fechar explicitamente `innerStream` quando já não necessita de mesmo.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto utilizado pelo <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> para enviar e receber dados.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that closing this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> has no effect on `innerstream`; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that closing this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> also closes `innerStream`.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que isto fechar <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> não tem qualquer efeito `innerstream`; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que isto fechar <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> também fecha `innerStream`.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a secção observações para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelos clientes para autenticar o cliente e, opcionalmente, o servidor, uma ligação de cliente-servidor.

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credentials and authentication options.
trans-unit.target: O processo de autenticação utiliza as credenciais especificadas e opções de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `requiredProtectionLevel` parâmetro para serviços de segurança de pedidos para os dados transmitidos através de fluxo autenticado.

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> value.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para que os dados assinados e encriptados, especifique o <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>valor.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação com êxito não garante que o pedido <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>foi concedido.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de verificar as <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Propriedades para determinar que serviços de segurança são utilizados pelo <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> e</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se falhar a autenticação, receberá um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>ou um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode tentar novamente a autenticação com uma credencial diferente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that is used to establish the identity of the client.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref> valores, que indica que os serviços de segurança para o fluxo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>valores, que indica como o servidor pode utilizar as credenciais o cliente para aceder aos recursos.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelos clientes para autenticar o cliente e, opcionalmente, o servidor, uma ligação de cliente-servidor.

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credential, authentication options, and channel binding.
trans-unit.target: O processo de autenticação utiliza a credencial especificada, as opções de autenticação e enlace de canal.

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `requiredProtectionLevel` parâmetro para serviços de segurança de pedidos para os dados transmitidos através de fluxo autenticado.

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> value.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para que os dados assinados e encriptados, especifique o <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>valor.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação com êxito não garante que o pedido <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>foi concedido.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de verificar as <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Propriedades para determinar que serviços de segurança são utilizados pelo <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> e</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> used for extended protection that is passed to this method in the `binding` parameter would be retrieved by an application from <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> property on the associated <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>utilizado para a proteção expandida que é transmitida a este método no `binding` parâmetro deverá ser obtido por uma aplicação da <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A>propriedade associada <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Se falhar a autenticação, receberá um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>ou um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode tentar novamente a autenticação com uma credencial diferente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that is used to establish the identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>que é utilizado para estabelecer a identidade do cliente.</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> that is used for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>que é utilizado para a proteção expandida.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: The Service Principal Name (SPN) that uniquely identifies the server to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de nome do Principal (SPN) que identifica exclusivamente o servidor para autenticar.

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the client's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação utiliza o cliente <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.target: Foi especificado nenhum nome Principal do serviço (SPN) para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, and mutual authentication is requested.
trans-unit.target: O nível de representação é <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, o nível de segurança é <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, e é pedida autenticação mútua.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>classe será construir o SPN utilizado para autenticação mútua.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Quando autenticação for bem sucedida, tem de verificar as <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Propriedades para determinar que serviços de segurança são utilizados pelo <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> e</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Verifique o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>propriedade para determinar se a autenticação mútua ocorreu.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Se falhar a autenticação, receberá um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>ou um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode tentar novamente a autenticação com uma credencial diferente.

trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>o objeto de tarefa que representa a operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de leitura assíncrona que lê dados a partir do fluxo e armazena-os na matriz especificada.

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it.
trans-unit.target: Se a encriptação, assinatura, ou de encriptação e assinatura estiverem ativadas, a operação de leitura lê os dados a partir do fluxo subjacente, verifica a integridade dos dados e desencripta a mesma.

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum segurança serviços, tais como a encriptação de dados ou a assinatura estão em utilização, este método é iniciada uma operação de leitura assíncrona no fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Este método é assíncrono e não bloqueia enquanto a operação for concluída.

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para bloquear enquanto a operação for concluída, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura assíncrona têm de ser concluída por chamar a <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o método é invocado pelo `asyncCallback` delegar.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como utilizar o modelo de programação assíncrono, consulte [chamada síncrona métodos de forma assíncrona](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>classe não suporta operações de leitura em simultâneo vários.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar iniciar uma operação de leitura enquanto outra ler operação já está a executar na mesma transmissão em fluxo, um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção será emitida.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível chamar este método até ter de ser autenticadas com êxito.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para autenticar, chamar um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is already a read operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: Já está em curso uma operação de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação não tiver ocorrido.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation that writes <xref:System.Byte>s from the specified buffer to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de escrita assíncrona que escreve <xref:System.Byte>s da memória intermédia especificada no fluxo.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Se a encriptação, assinatura, ou de encriptação e assinatura estiverem ativados, este método lê os dados a partir da memória intermédia, encripta, inicia, ou encripta e assina-o e transmite-la utilizando o fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous write operation on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum segurança serviços, tais como a encriptação de dados ou a assinatura estão em utilização, este método é iniciada uma operação de escrita assíncrona no fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Este método é assíncrono e não bloqueia enquanto a operação for concluída.

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para bloquear enquanto a operação for concluída, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura assíncrona têm de ser concluída por chamar a <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o método é invocado pelo `asyncCallback` delegar.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como utilizar o modelo de programação assíncrono, consulte [chamada síncrona métodos de forma assíncrona](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>classe não suporta várias operações de escrita em simultâneo.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar iniciar uma operação de escrita, enquanto outra operação de escrita já está a executar na mesma transmissão em fluxo, um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção será emitida.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível chamar este método até ter de ser autenticadas com êxito.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para autenticar, chamar um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that supplies the bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Byte>matriz que fornece os bytes para escrita no fluxo.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: A localização com base em zero no `buffer` no qual pretende começar a ler bytes a escrever no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the number of bytes to read from `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que especifica o número de bytes a ler a partir do `buffer`.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that references the method to invoke when the write operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegado que referencia o método a invocar quando a operação de escrita está concluída.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo utilizador, que contém informações sobre a operação de escrita.

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the `asyncCallback` delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é passado para o `asyncCallback` delegar ao concluir a operação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>objeto que indica o estado da operação assíncrona.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o fluxo subjacente é legível.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.target: Se tiver ocorrido uma autenticação com êxito, esta propriedade devolve o valor devolvido pelo invocar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>propriedade no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if authentication has occurred and the underlying stream is readable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver ocorrido uma autenticação e o fluxo subjacente é legível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o fluxo subjacente é pesquisável.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.target: Não deve tentar definir a posição do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>objeto ou o fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the underlying stream supports time-outs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o fluxo subjacente suporta tempos limite.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor devolvido pelo invocar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanTimeout%2A>propriedade no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.CanTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying stream supports time-outs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o fluxo subjacente suporta tempos limite; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o fluxo subjacente é gravável.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver ocorrido uma autenticação e o fluxo subjacente é gravável; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>referências.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous client authentication operation that was started with a call to <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient*>.
trans-unit.target: Termina uma operação de autenticação de cliente assíncrona pendente que foi iniciada com uma chamada para <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient*>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient*>

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: Se não tiver sido concluída a operação, este método bloqueia até que o faz.

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a autenticação é concluída com êxito, tem de verificar as <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Propriedades para determinar que serviços de segurança são utilizados pelo <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> e</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Verifique o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>propriedade para determinar se a autenticação mútua ocorreu.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Se falhar a autenticação, receberá um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>ou um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode tentar novamente a autenticação com uma credencial diferente.

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar esta operação de forma síncrona, utilize um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para autenticar, chamar um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar esta operação de forma síncrona, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by a call to <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*>
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>instância devolvida por uma chamada para <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*></xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult was not created by a call to <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*>.

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação não tiver ocorrido.

trans-unit.source: The write operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação de escrita falhou.

trans-unit.source: Causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que todos os dados colocados em memória intermédia para serem escritos para o dispositivo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates how the server can use the client's credentials.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica como o servidor pode utilizar as credenciais do cliente.

trans-unit.source: You must successfully authenticate before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Deve autenticar com êxito antes de chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: Clients specify the impersonation level when they request authentication by calling one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Os clientes de especificar o nível de representação quando solicitarem autenticação chamando um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate without specifying a <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> , <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se autenticar sem especificar um <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>é utilizado.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>valores.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: Authentication failed or has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação falhou ou não tiver ocorrido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether authentication was successful.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se a autenticação foi bem sucedida.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Clients authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Autenticam clientes ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Servidores autenticar-se ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver ocorrido a autenticação com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se esta <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> utiliza a encriptação de dados.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data; namely, it helps to ensure that while data is in transit it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: Encriptação ajuda a proteger a privacidade dos dados; nomeadamente, ajuda a garantir que dados enquanto estes se encontram em trânsito-não é possível deciphered por terceiros.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados são encriptados antes de ser transmitida através da rede e desencriptados quando atinge o ponto final remoto; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether both the server and the client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o servidor e o cliente foi autenticadas.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Mutual authentication is specified by the client when the client wants the server to provide credentials for authentication.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação mútua é especificada pelo cliente quando o cliente quer que o servidor para fornecer credenciais para autenticação.

trans-unit.source: By default, clients request mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, os clientes solicitam a autenticação mútua.

trans-unit.source: The Negotiate protocol selects either NTLM or Kerberos depending on the security protocols supported by the client and server.
trans-unit.target: O protocolo de negociar seleciona NTLM ou Kerberos consoante os protocolos de segurança suportados pelo cliente e servidor.

trans-unit.source: NTLM does not support mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: NTLM não suporta a autenticação mútua.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server has been authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o servidor foi autenticado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o local lado da ligação é utilizado por este <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> foi autenticada como o servidor.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If authentication failed or did not occur, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a autenticação falhou ou não ocorriam, esta propriedade devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate as the server, call the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar a autenticação como o servidor, chame o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the local endpoint was successfully authenticated as the server side of the authenticated connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o ponto final local foi autenticado com êxito como o lado do servidor de ligação autenticada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se os dados enviados utilizando esta sequência estão assinados.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data; namely, it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: Assinatura de dados ajuda a proteger a integridade dos dados; nomeadamente, ajuda o destinatário a determinar se os dados foram adulterados em trânsito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados estão assinados antes de a ser transmitidos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento do fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor devolvido pelo invocar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>propriedade no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is not seekable, this property will typically throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo subjacente não é pesquisável, esta propriedade, normalmente, irá gerar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de tempo de execução do fluxo subjacente determina o tipo de tempo de execução da exceção que é acionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int64> that specifies the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>que especifica o comprimento do fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property is not supported when the underlying stream is a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obter o valor desta propriedade não é suportada quando o fluxo subjacente é um <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position in the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição atual no fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor devolvido pelo invocar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>propriedade no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is not seekable, this property will typically throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo subjacente não é pesquisável, esta propriedade, normalmente, irá gerar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de tempo de execução do fluxo subjacente determina o tipo de tempo de execução da exceção que é acionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int64> that specifies the current position in the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int64>que especifica a posição atual no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Reads data from this stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Lê dados a partir desta sequência e armazena-os na matriz especificada.

trans-unit.source: The method reads a maximum of `count` bytes from the current stream and stores them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: O método lê um máximo de `count` bytes do atual transmitir e armazena-os na `buffer` começando na `offset`.

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível chamar este método até ter de ser autenticadas com êxito.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para autenticar, chamar um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar esta operação assíncrona, utilize o <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that receives the bytes read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Byte>matriz que recebe os bytes lido do fluxo.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> containing the zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que contém a localização com base em zero no `buffer` no qual pretende começar a armazenar os dados lida neste fluxo.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> containing the maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que contém o número máximo de bytes a ler do fluxo.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the number of bytes read from the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>ler o valor que especifica o número de bytes do fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: When there is no more data to be read, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Quando não houver nenhuma mais dados para ser de leitura, devolve 0.

trans-unit.source: The read operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Falha na operação de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação não tiver ocorrido.

trans-unit.source: A Read operation is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação de leitura já está em curso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a read operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de tempo que limite à espera de dados de blocos de uma operação de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor devolvido pelo invocar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>propriedade no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream is set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, o <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>valor no fluxo subjacente estiver definido como o valor especificado.</xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, ReadTimeout is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that read operations do not time out.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo subjacente é um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, ReadTimeout em milissegundos e é definido <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>por predefinição, para que ler operações fazer não o tempo limite.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time that will elapse before a read operation fails.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que especifica o período de tempo que irá decorrer antes de falha de uma operação de leitura.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the identity of the remote party sharing this authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações sobre a identidade da parte remota partilha este fluxo autenticado.

trans-unit.source: When accessed by the client, this property returns a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity> containing the Service Principal Name (SPN) of the server and the authentication protocol used.
trans-unit.target: Quando acedido pelo cliente, esta propriedade devolve um <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>que contém o serviço de nome do Principal (SPN) do servidor e o protocolo de autenticação utilizado.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>

trans-unit.source: When accessed by the server, this property returns a <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> that describes the client.
trans-unit.target: Quando acedido pelo servidor, esta propriedade devolve um <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>que descreve o cliente.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> is not available, client information is returned to the server in a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>está não disponível, as informações do cliente são devolvidas para o servidor no <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> object that describes the identity of the remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>objeto que descreve a identidade do ponto final remoto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: Authentication failed or has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação falhou ou não tiver ocorrido.

trans-unit.source: Throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Gera <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método.

trans-unit.source: It is inherited, but is not supported by <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: É herdada, mas não é suportado pelo <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emite <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Seeking is not supported on <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa não é suportada no <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Define o comprimento do fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>valor que especifica o comprimento da sequência.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Write the specified number of <xref:System.Byte>s to the underlying stream using the specified buffer and offset.
trans-unit.target: Escrever o número especificado de <xref:System.Byte>s para o fluxo subjacente utilizando a memória intermédia especificada e o desvio.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Se a encriptação, assinatura, ou de encriptação e assinatura estiverem ativados, este método lê os dados a partir da memória intermédia, encripta, inicia, ou encripta e assina-o e transmite-la utilizando o fluxo subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method invokes <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum segurança serviços, tais como a encriptação de dados ou a assinatura estão em utilização, este método invoca <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the write operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Este método bloqueia enquanto estiver concluída a operação de escrita.

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking while the operation completes, use the Write method.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar bloquear enquanto a operação for concluída, utilize o método de escrita.

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível chamar este método até ter de ser autenticadas com êxito.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para autenticar, chamar um do <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, ou <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>classe não suporta várias operações de escrita em simultâneo.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar iniciar uma operação de escrita, enquanto outra operação de escrita já está a executar na mesma transmissão em fluxo, um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção será emitida.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that supplies the bytes written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Byte>matriz que fornece os bytes escritos no fluxo.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que contém a localização com base em zero no `buffer` no qual pretende começar a ler bytes a escrever no fluxo.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of bytes to read from `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que contém o número de bytes a ler a partir do `buffer`.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: There is already a write operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: Já está em curso uma operação de escrita.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação não tiver ocorrido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de tempo que limite à espera de dados de blocos de uma operação de escrita.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor devolvido pelo invocar o <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>propriedade no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For set operations, the specified value sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Para operações de conjunto, define o valor especificado a <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>valor no fluxo subjacente.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that write operations do not time out.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo subjacente é um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout em milissegundos e é definido <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>por predefinição, para que escrever operações fazer não o tempo limite.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time that will elapse before a write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>que especifica o período de tempo que irá decorrer antes de falha de uma operação de escrita.</xref:System.Int32>
